root.name: Crimson Dragon
root.description: OverviewCrimson Dragon Announced at Tokyo Game Show 2010, the game originally known as Project Draco is a game directed by Yukio Futatsugi, the man responsible for Phantom Dust and the Panzer Dragoon franchise. The game is scheduled to be released along side the Xbox One as a launch title November 22, 2013.The game is a product of Futatsugi's studio Groundling Inc. Futatsugi is directing, with lead design from Tomohiro Kondo and concept art from Manabu Kusunoki.A spinoff titled Crimson Dragon: Side Story was released for Windows Phone on September 12, 2012.GameplayOriginally a Kinect only title, Crimson Dragon now includes the option to be played with a controller or be played as it was originally intended with the Xbox One's Kinect.Left hand/trigger fires powerful single shots, right hand/tigger is used to lock on and fire lasers and both hands are used to fire off the spirit gauge to unleash a wide spread attack which charges up over time.
